title: Region Locks, why do other regions get them and we don't?
body:
Hello dudes,
Why do some regions get region locks and other don't? I've had my Korean account banned and can't access my Garena account because of region blocks because I live in Australia and don't care to use a VPN. I constantly get told my mothers going to be dead by Asians out of no where and they start saying random fucking insults, constantly talking about how I'm white. My problem is that they tell me they aren't playing in the oce region, which is fair enough but I don't have the same opportunity to join theirs which is what irritates me.
Can I get an explanation on why their regions get locked or why ours can't also be locked to AU and NZ?

replies.body: Because oce is bigger than jsut aus and nz, although its infested with Chinese, a good handful of them are actually students, who really, if they cant speak proper english shouldn't be over here anyway.
